languages.text: "Почему же? Захватывающая экспозиция достижений гемункульского искусства. Тебе следовало бы быть благодарной за возможность лицезреть эти творения со стороны, а не в качестве препарата".
"Why? It is a fascinating display of the achievements of Haemonculi art. You should be grateful for the opportunity to view these creations from the outside rather than as a specimen."
languages.original_text: "Почему же? Захватывающая экспозиция достижений гемункульского искусства. Тебе следовало бы быть благодарной за возможность лицезреть эти творения со стороны, а не в качестве препарата".

traits.locale_text: "Why? It is a fascinating display of the achievements of Haemonculi art. You should be grateful for the opportunity to view these creations from the outside rather than as a specimen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why? It is a fascinating display of the achievements of Haemonculi art. You should be grateful for the opportunity to view these creations from the outside rather than as a specimen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why? It is a fascinating display of the achievements of Haemonculi art. You should be grateful for the opportunity to view these creations from the outside rather than as a specimen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why? It is a fascinating display of the achievements of Haemonculi art. You should be grateful for the opportunity to view these creations from the outside rather than as a specimen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “为什么？这可是场引人入胜的展览，展示了血伶人艺术造诣达到了何种成就。你应该感谢命运，让你有机会从外面观赏这些作品，而不是作为标本亲身经历。”
languages.original_text: "Why? It is a fascinating display of the achievements of Haemonculi art. You should be grateful for the opportunity to view these creations from the outside rather than as a specimen."

traits.locale_text: “为什么？这可是场引人入胜的展览，展示了血伶人艺术造诣达到了何种成就。你应该感谢命运，让你有机会从外面观赏这些作品，而不是作为标本亲身经历。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Pourquoi ? Vous avez pourtant pu voir de vos propres yeux ce dont l'art des hémoncules est capable. Vous devriez vous réjouir d'en avoir été seulement témoin, et non victime. »
languages.original_text: "Why? It is a fascinating display of the achievements of Haemonculi art. You should be grateful for the opportunity to view these creations from the outside rather than as a specimen."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi ? Vous avez pourtant pu voir de vos propres yeux ce dont l'art des hémoncules est capable. Vous devriez vous réjouir d'en avoir été seulement témoin, et non victime. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Por qué? Fue una exposición fascinante del arte de los Hemónculos. Deberías estar agradecida por poder ver las creaciones desde fuera en vez de formar parte de ellas».
languages.original_text: "Why? It is a fascinating display of the achievements of Haemonculi art. You should be grateful for the opportunity to view these creations from the outside rather than as a specimen."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué? Fue una exposición fascinante del arte de los Hemónculos. Deberías estar agradecida por poder ver las creaciones desde fuera en vez de formar parte de ellas».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「なぜだ？ハモンキュラスの技術が成したことだ、魅力的に映るだろ。標本としてじゃなく、外部からこんな創造物を見られる機会に感謝すべきじゃないのか」
languages.original_text: "Why? It is a fascinating display of the achievements of Haemonculi art. You should be grateful for the opportunity to view these creations from the outside rather than as a specimen."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜだ？ハモンキュラスの技術が成したことだ、魅力的に映るだろ。標本としてじゃなく、外部からこんな創造物を見られる機会に感謝すべきじゃないのか」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Warum? Das ist eine faszinierende Zurschaustellung der Errungenschaften der Kunst der Haemonculi. Ihr solltet dankbar sein, dass Ihr die Gelegenheit bekommt, diese Schöpfungen von außen zu betrachten, statt als Exponat."
languages.original_text: "Why? It is a fascinating display of the achievements of Haemonculi art. You should be grateful for the opportunity to view these creations from the outside rather than as a specimen."

traits.locale_text: "Warum? Das ist eine faszinierende Zurschaustellung der Errungenschaften der Kunst der Haemonculi. Ihr solltet dankbar sein, dass Ihr die Gelegenheit bekommt, diese Schöpfungen von außen zu betrachten, statt als Exponat."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Why? It is a fascinating display of the achievements of Haemonculi art. You should be grateful for the opportunity to view these creations from the outside rather than as a specimen."

languages.text: "Neden? Bu, Haimonkulus sanatındaki başarıların etkileyici bir gösterisidir. Bu yaratımları numune olarak değil de uzaktan inceleyebildiğin için müteşekkir olmalısın."
languages.original_text: "Why? It is a fascinating display of the achievements of Haemonculi art. You should be grateful for the opportunity to view these creations from the outside rather than as a specimen."

traits.locale_text: "Neden? Haimonkulus sanatındaki başarıların etkileyici bir gösterisidir bu. Bu yaratımları bir numune olarak değil de uzaktan inceleyebildiğin için müteşekkir olmalısın."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
